column4: hey all, anyone know much about the 9.10 upgrade? i did it, and now it fubar'd grub up... i've since installed grub2, and it thinks things are fine but it errors out saying the /dev/disk/by-uuid isn't present. it's not
ok but since it's a grub issue i thoguth i could ask here
9.10 is using grub2, 9.04 uses grub so the people in #ubuntu+1 would have more info
